amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to increase and decrease funding for the Innovative Readiness Training Program by $4.356 million, for the purpose of supporting DOD's efforts to produce mission-ready forces through military training opportunities and simultaneously provide key services for American communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gonzalez-Colon (PR) amendment (A104) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gonzalez-Colon (PR) amendment (A104) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A104) offered by Miss Gonzalez-Colon (PR).
